title: VR-Based Wildfire Suppression Manager Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational fire suppression procedures and team leadership experience
context.additional_context: Field-intensive training using smartphone-compatible VR equipment. Aims to enhance decision-making skills in a virtual environment simulating real wildfire scenarios

learning_goals: Perform strategic decision-making that meets three-tiered evaluation criteria (response speed, resource allocation, team control) in virtual wildfire scenarios
Identify five types of fire spread patterns with 80% accuracy in VR simulation environments
Achieve a score of 4.0/5.0 or higher in post-training self-efficacy surveys

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
